name: Teacher Subject Allocation Management System /edit-teacher-info.php文件SQL注入漏洞
product: ["Teacher Subject Allocation Management System Teacher Subject Allocation Management System 1.0"]
description: Teacher Subject Allocation Management System一个教师学科分配管理系统。Teacher Subject Allocation Management System存在SQL注入漏洞，该漏洞源于文件/admin/edit-teacher-info.php中参数editid缺少对外部输入SQL语句的验证。攻击者可利用该漏洞执行非法SQL命令窃取数据库敏感数据。
solution:
目前厂商尚未发布升级程序修复该安全问题，详情见厂商官网：
https://phpgurukul.com/
